trans-unit.source: Enables the creation of an XPath from a data contract.
trans-unit.target: 允许从数据协定的 XPath 的创建。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XPath using the specified operation name, parameter name, and data contract information.
trans-unit.target: 创建使用指定的操作名称、 参数名称和数据协定信息 XPath。

trans-unit.source: The name of the service contract XML element that contains the service contract namespace.
trans-unit.target: 包含服务协定命名空间的服务协定 XML 元素的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the service operation.
The name of the service operation parameter.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the service operation is a response; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示服务操作是一种响应;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The metadata, generated using the <xref:System.Type.GetMember*> method of the <xref:System.Type> class, which points to the specific data member used to generated the query.
trans-unit.target: 生成使用的元数据<xref:System.Type.GetMember*>方法<xref:System.Type>类，用于指向用于生成查询的特定数据成员。</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Type.GetMember*>

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the XML namespaces and their prefixes found in the data contract.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含的 XML 命名空间和数据协定中找到其前缀。

trans-unit.source: Instantiate this parameter before passing it in this method.
trans-unit.target: 然后再将它传递此方法中实例化此参数。

trans-unit.source: The XPath generated from the specified operation name, parameter name, and data contract information.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的操作名称、 参数名称和数据生成的 XPath 协定信息。
